attributes.action: Close all retail shops on Boxing Day and New Years Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because shop workers have a hard enough time with low pay! (No I am not a shop worker but I can find better things to do on these days like spend them with my family!)

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Close all retail shops on Boxing Day and New Years Day."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11290.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/retailshutdown/
